website_summaries.verdict: A reliable and easy to use test strip that can be used with blood from your palms, arms, or finger.
pros: Can be purchased without a prescription
To be used with the FreeStyle Lite monitor
Comes with software you can use to download and track your readings
cons: These test strips are a little more expensive than other strips on the market

customer_reviews.title: Not for sale in USA?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how I feel about the 2 sharpie marks on the box of text strips I received that appear to be a weak attempt to cross out the words “Not for sale in USA”. Did I mention that I live in the USA?
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey P.

customer_reviews.title: Untrusworthy
customer_reviews.text: These test strip were very untrustworthy, the picture on the far left is the untrustworthy one as it has a yellow bottle, the one to the right is the one that has the Abbott log and is the one I have been buying for years. The readings fluctuated constantly, too high or too low. I had to check with some I bought from an outside vendor not and I've had some problems buying it from Amazon recently. I ended up stopping using these test strip. The bottle did not look like the one I purchased before, which has the Abbott Logo and made me suspicious. I could not return these as I was out of the country
customer_reviews.author: Asha Puskin

customer_reviews.title: Repackaged. Kind of suspicious.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in box that did not match picture. Repackaged at another pharmaceutical with "new" labels covering "old" labels indicating these strips were for use with a different type of meter. Tested a few strips and they indicated my blood sugar was 50- 60 points higher than with my properly labeled test strips from the drug store.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Two

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend it! Malfunctioning test strips!
customer_reviews.text: This company makes sure that 2-5 strips are always malfunctioning in each of their batches! It's super aggravating! I mean these things are an arm and a leg! So nothing makes me grumpier than wasting my money without it being my fault! I know how to use a test strip. So it's not user error. I really hate this company! I need to try another.
customer_reviews.author: ClassyCurly

customer_reviews.title: Not Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I tested my self at the doctors office with the Freestyle meter and he then tested me at the same but sent the sample to the lab. The Freestyle meter was 15 points lower than the hospital lab result. I contacted Freestyle who informed me that the test strips I had were not for use in the U.S.A. They acknowledged that the strips are the same world wide but questioned the storage and shipping of these strips en route to the U.S.A.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos

customer_reviews.title: Showing higher numbers
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I bought a large quantity of these and spent a lot of money on a product that is not reliable. I compared this test strip to the one my local pharmacy dispensed and to the lab work at the hospital with the same drop of blood for all three and this test strip showed considerably higher numbers. That’s a big deal when my son’s issue is hypoglycemia and 15 point difference is huge in terms of his treatment. I will not be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lazarevic

customer_reviews.title: Scam - Knock off does not work!
customer_reviews.text: These strips are worthless. They are a knock off and they are not accurate at all. Do not bother with them.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Barnedt

customer_reviews.title: These seem very inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Just got these and the packaging was different than the ones I got from the local Pharmacy. Hi level test solution showed 73 on them compared to 137 on my other meter. Also, compared to my other meter with an actual blood test, they read @ 20-25 pts low. Definitely suspect fakes
customer_reviews.author: KAVegas

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy is in question but they are easy to use
customer_reviews.text: FreeStyle is the first blood test meter strips that I've used for several months and they worked alright no problem until I had the opportunity to compare these to the OneTouch and to my local doctor. The Freestyle constantly reads lower than the OneTouch and this was verified by comparing with results of my local doctors lab. So now this is only my backup meter and not my primary use meter.
customer_reviews.author: skippy

customer_reviews.title: Not for sale in USA?
customer_reviews.text: I bought test strips. Had varying reading with in 5 minutes of testing 108, 147, 112, 130, 132... Top cap of dispenser says not for sale in USA. So much for ordering healthcare products from here!!
customer_reviews.author: FHGf1506lrt56z

customer_reviews.title: Good or bad, not sure
customer_reviews.text: This product has a sticker covering the front of the box, it’s similar to the one I’ve bought before but the few differences make me think is fake, also the product states “Not for sale in USA”
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Cost and Consumer Reports review lead me to try these first.
customer_reviews.text: I went with the advice of Consumer Reports for the meter and the strips. The tiny amount of blood needed is amazing. I've experienced no strip failures.
customer_reviews.author: David Bird

customer_reviews.title: Relabeled & Repackaged
customer_reviews.text: These test strips have been relabeled and repackaged. The strips are manufactured in the UK per the original label that is underneath the top label. Also very close to being expired. Inconsistent and bad readings, anywhere from 15-60 points off. Do not buy if you are really trying to keep your blood sugars down. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They Work Better As Time Goes On
customer_reviews.text: I Had To Redo My Review My Strips Don't Give A Higher Reading Anymore Almost Matches My Other USA Strips Only Off By 4 Less Instead Off 9 Higher. I Will Be Reordering. Great Price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Banks

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: It is important to me a diabetic to obtain supplies that are cost effective and not expired and you reach both factors. As a health care provider my insurance is not very kind to my pockets. So I will continue to be a customer thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ann

customer_reviews.title: Most accurate on the market
customer_reviews.text: This product is the most accurate on the market. It was originally made by a company called Medisense. The accuracy comes when you have very high or very little results so it might be within 5% accuracy for a sugar of 400 as opposed to 25% on most other Glucometers. Part of the accuracy is it adjusts to room temperatures. I’m very glad I found it. I had this particular unit standardized in my hospital back in the mid 90s after an evaluation by a pathologist where I worked at the time .
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Blodgett

customer_reviews.title: Many faulty strips in package
customer_reviews.text: The last 2 batches I ordered have many strips that don't work! I can see the printing of the little circles is off and sometimes I have to use 5 or 6 strips before it will read one! Really annoying and painful to have to keep pricking my finger. I don't have this issue when I pick them up at the pharmacy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the accuracy might be questioned because you have no idea what it goes thru in shipping
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Be aware if ordering
customer_reviews.text: No where did ad say these strips were from Ireland although they appear to be genuine Abbott. All packaging & materials are in another language. Lid says not for sale in US. Having said that, they apoesr to be working accurately & price better.
customer_reviews.author: GEM

customer_reviews.title: Normal retail box of Freestyle Lite strips
customer_reviews.text: I've seen other reviews where people received the product with odd or international packaging. Mine arrived with seemingly the exact same packing and product that I normally purchase from a local pharmacy here in the U.S. Product works and reads as normal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Williams

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was not in English
customer_reviews.text: These were for a family member who luckily is very familiar with using them. Why lucky? Because what I/we actually received was not in English packaging. However, they still worked in the monitor. Just would have been rough if they were for someone new to using them.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K.

customer_reviews.title: Godsend
customer_reviews.text: These test strips were a Godsend! My grandfather has diabetes and ran out. They were $163 at our local pharmacy WITH INSURANCE! Absolutely absurd!! These came in the mail quickly and even though I was skeptical due to other reviews when they arrived I was happy to see they were packaged just as the others. Exp. 06/2021. We tested them and they were accurate. I will be buying more ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: RaivenMama

customer_reviews.title: Great Realiable Test Strips, but Not Always Useable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these test strips and that I can use them in my omnipod pump reducing the amount of things I need to carry around with me. I find these to be extremely accurate and that you get what you pay for. HOWEVER, the one flaw is there are always 2-5 strips that are bent and cannot be inserted into my pump and are plain not useable! This is frustrating considering how much you’re paying per strip as it is.
customer_reviews.author: loy4lty

customer_reviews.title: Use caution
customer_reviews.text: I believe these are faulty. I tested against ones from the pharmacy any they were all over. First test from pharmacy strips was 91, 2nd from these - would not take up the sample, 3rd from these was 57 and 4th from these was103. Beware, the directions were in spanish.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Box had been opened.
customer_reviews.text: This box wasn't sealed when it arrived. I haven't run a control test to determine whether the strips are any good, but if the box comes crumpled and wide open, that is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Gee99

customer_reviews.title: Do not work!
customer_reviews.text: These do not work with the Freestyle Freedom Lite meter according to the manufacturer Abbott Labs. The vial they came in clearly states “Not for sale in USA”.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Way better price than my insurance prescription offers
customer_reviews.text: More than $125 thru mail order with major insurance company, less than $60. Only difference I see is plastic container is yellow rather than white
customer_reviews.author: tjf

customer_reviews.title: Better Value than at a Pharmacy
customer_reviews.text: At a pharmacy, I would have to pay between $80 and $90 out of pocket for the same product. The only reason it makes sense to get it at a pharmacy is if you have insurance.
customer_reviews.author: Timber Merchant

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a relative newby to all things diabetes. I used to use a Walgreen's brand glucometer. I would get error messages over and over. This glucose meter and it's strips have not given me an error message ONCE! I'm so Happy about that! Also, you get the results almost immediately!
customer_reviews.author: RBC

customer_reviews.title: Work well wth Freestyle light glucometer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for elderly parent to use with her Freestyle light glucose monitor. Works well with monitor, and also a lot cheaper than purchasing from local Walgreens pharmacy. Seem to be accurate. I would recommend these strips for diabetics, or pre diabetics that occasionally check their glucose level.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P.

customer_reviews.title: Defective item
customer_reviews.text: These strips are totally defective. 5 so far haven’t been able to record any glucose levels
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not receiving accurate results
customer_reviews.text: These test strips are not accurate and seem 'preset' 'to give the SAME reading/result MULTIPLE times, which is VERY unlikely if they were real test strips. Perhaps they have been damaged by temperature or some other factors. Would Not reconned for use.
customer_reviews.author: MoeBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Authenticity!!!!! quality!
customer_reviews.text: Theses products are not real. They appear to be a product to look authentic. The label is covering a different item. The cap is the wrong color (yellow) Good price but what’s the point when you are purchasing something so vital for your health! If I could give 0 stars I would
customer_reviews.author: Dawneray

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Ordered
customer_reviews.text: Needed new test strips since mine had expired. These were exactly as advertised and have a great deal of time before they expire--perfect for what I need!
customer_reviews.author: L. Misciasci

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: You are at the mercy of Freestyle with their ridiculous pricing but its needed for diabetics and we use this for our dog after calibrating it with a dog strip and the controlled solution.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: The price on these are much more reasonable buying them through Amazon than using our insurance. Diabetic meds are very expensive so we appreciate the price. Customer service from the seller is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Mercer

customer_reviews.title: "not for sale in USA"
customer_reviews.text: File under: fool me twice ... I see where in a previous review I claimed I was done ordering from these guys .... so I ordered from these guys .... again. I "forgot". Anyway, another yellow container which means "not for sale in the US".
customer_reviews.author: William E. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Awful Test Strips
customer_reviews.text: Only about 1 in 4 don't report an error message. These are defective.
customer_reviews.author: Prince

customer_reviews.title: DON'T USE! FAULTY!
customer_reviews.text: These test strips are completely INACCURATE. My husband's sugar crashed down to 35 last night due to these inaccurate readings. Almost had to call an ambulance for him. Thanks for selling me a faulty product that could've cost my loved one their LIFE. YOU SHOULD NOT BE SELLING THESE OF THEY DO NOT WORK. YOU COULD KILL SOMEONE. There's also a second label slapped on the vial over the first one. I hope no one ese purchases these. they're unsafe garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Glaze

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Half the test strips don’t work. Used 6 just for one test. All the strips give my meter an error code. Not worth the money. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Bad Test Strips
customer_reviews.text: These are test strips for glucose meter for diabetics. Canister containing the strips specifically said "Not for sale in the USA"... this message makes them unacceptable for use by anyone in America. Possibility for faulty readings and thus medically dangerous. Very upset this is the second time I've ordered test strips from Amazon and gotten these good test. 😠
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: A good value
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for years and the don't let me down
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Artusa

customer_reviews.title: Glucose Test Strips
customer_reviews.text: ran out of mine and was not able to get replacements from my physician, so I bought these and although expensive, did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Sieverson

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey, but good
customer_reviews.text: Twice as expensive than the test strips I used to purchase for my old meter, but also far easier (and faster) to use, so it evens out.
customer_reviews.author: Cap'n Dave

customer_reviews.title: Different Language
customer_reviews.text: These arrived with all the outer and inner packaging in a different language. Sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Niemela

customer_reviews.title: Not for sale in USA
customer_reviews.text: Top of cap states “ Not for sale in USA”. Repackaged in UK. I used to entire package but about 5 of 50 did not suck up blood. The item description did not state the strips were repackaged in UK. The item description is deceiving and not truthful. I am new to blood glucose monitoring so bad on me. I will NEVER by this or any other medical product that is repackaged in another country that clearly states “Not for sale in USA”.
customer_reviews.author: Tamama

customer_reviews.title: The BEST 👍💯
customer_reviews.text: I have had the glucometer for a decade but not a reliable place to get test strips. So happy to have them on Amazon. They are just as pictured and I use daily. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Works with the meter I also bought on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: These work just fine for my meter and I live in the U.S. But it is important to note that I also bought my meter on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Strips give accurate results
customer_reviews.text: Strips are the same quality as the higher-priced ones I'd been buying. Expiration dates are far into the future, a year away. Delivery was ahead of schedule ~ product well-packaged and in perfect condition. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Gal

customer_reviews.title: Fake and Illegal
customer_reviews.text: That's all you need to know, folks! These are not the real strips and there are probably numerous laws being broken by selling them. I did not receive real FreeStyle Lite test strips but these fake ones instead. I compared what I received against genuine FreeStyle Lite test strips and OneTouch test strips (using the same blood from the same finger) and yep, these are not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt M. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Affordable test strips
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for making FreeStyle lite test strips available on line. Easy to use test strips which do not need much blood. No delay either like some other meters.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Par the course
customer_reviews.text: The actual container wasn't opened but the cardboard case was opened. Don't know if that happened during delivery. As far as product value, what can I say? They're test strips, so I'll undoubtedly order them again. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W.

customer_reviews.title: There are duds in the test strips
customer_reviews.text: Four of the test strips showed error BEFORE blood could be applied and IMMEDIATELY upon being inserted into the device, and I’m not through even half the bottle. This has never happened before, I use the same vendor. I think this is a bad batch. I paid money for repeated duds.
customer_reviews.author: SarahAlbright

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Works with my old freestyle monitor and easy to use. Just pop them in.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: In German
customer_reviews.text: This is the box I received which does not match the box pictured in the product description. It’s all in German even the inside descriptions, which makes is useless to me since I speak English not German. I haven’t used them yet, but I walked feel cheated since this is not the product I thought I was buying. I libe in the USA, don’t send me a product made in Germany, especially when that’s not what was advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra Franco

customer_reviews.title: Value!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for a family member so I don't know how it works but I do know that they loved it and said it was great!
customer_reviews.author: DIONNE

customer_reviews.title: Prompt delivery...accurate product
customer_reviews.text: It is great to be able to order these and get them promptly. Good service...product as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth himes maslin

customer_reviews.title: Less Costly
customer_reviews.text: I've used this brand for a few years now because it's less costly than Accu-Check. I'm concerned however about having these delivered to my mailbox in the cold Minnesota winter.
customer_reviews.author: sljelm

customer_reviews.title: Life style lite strips
customer_reviews.text: We use these with our diabetic dog. They work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Strips are defective!! Not for sale in USA
customer_reviews.text: Right on the lid, it states not for sale in USA. They did not work with my meter.
customer_reviews.author: Rickgi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product not only arrived promptly but it also came with a note that I adored see these strips are for my cat who was recently diagnosed with diabetes so too see the note with the cute little bichon on it brightened what has been a stressful time in my household so thank you very much excellent service
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Just ok and too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Some defective in container Very expensive, found better deal elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Special “K”

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Results were consistency very high and I then purchased a Freestyle Lite box from CVS and their strip results were much lower and appeared more inline with past results. I then saw writing under the label which was another label from Ireland. I do not have confidence in these strips and will not use them. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Pimenta

customer_reviews.title: Dependable!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for many years and I am still very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Do No Purchase - Defective & Not in Original Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a repacked, European version of the test strips that are not for sale in the US. They were also defective. I tested the reading against one of my American ones from my pharmacy and this had a reading 26 points higher. Do not purchase test strips from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: M from VA

customer_reviews.title: They will send you strips that are about to expire
customer_reviews.text: The strips on the left were sent from my doctor 2 months after receiving the strips on the right (open container) The strips from my doctor will expire in 18 months; the strips ordered from this company expired approximately 3 months after receiving them. They expired before I used half of them. Not good to send strips that are this close to expiring...
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Niles

customer_reviews.title: Fresh product expiration date in 2019
customer_reviews.text: Delivered Fast and product was Not short dated, old stock. I want to thank the Disabled Vet for the enclosed card and charm. may God bless you.
customer_reviews.author: old camel bricker

customer_reviews.title: Right test strips at a good price
customer_reviews.text: The cheapest price I could find for these necessary strips
customer_reviews.author: F Fernald

customer_reviews.title: FAST n FRIENDLY
customer_reviews.text: Extremely fast delivery, came with a very nice note that I appreciate. Good people need good people to be healthy and happy! Great job!!!
customer_reviews.author: SZEPNSHER

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The product quality is very good and the price is reasonable. The seller’s products are beautifully packaged and the logistics is great, I will recommend friends to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie.mi

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, nice price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice price for this. Usually expensive locally. Love saving money.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Neal

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my sick parents!!! ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sick parents!!! I can’t believe how unethical you are to sell this in USA.
customer_reviews.author: BAHAREH SABZEHEI

customer_reviews.title: Well within user dates
customer_reviews.text: This seller is a consistently good supplier. settled on them as an economical and reliable source , well several cycles ago
customer_reviews.author: C Bo

customer_reviews.title: Diabetes supplies
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I need at a decent price. Cheaper than I pay under insurance coverage
customer_reviews.author: harpur

customer_reviews.title: My criticism
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the paper design the strips are sealed in. I find it difficult to separate the front from the backing (my fingers are fatty and numb from aging). I don"t see the purpose and value of the slots on each end of the strips. Thank you but I will not repurchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Genzlinger

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my order came quickly
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my order came quickly, all my products I've order I am really impressive thank you again. I really like Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ava VIALDORES

customer_reviews.title: feel cheated
customer_reviews.text: add very misleading to anyone who knows what comes in that box its always 2 tubes of 50 count for around 52 dallars you advertise with that box and send 1 tube of 50 for 32 wont ever buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to love something that requires you to jab yourself hard enough to draw blood!
customer_reviews.author: Bob G

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work propery
customer_reviews.text: It works not properly, it's waste of money. Would give back, but trow already package.
customer_reviews.author: John W Wise

customer_reviews.title: Looking for accuracy of the reading
customer_reviews.text: The price is a little high, but I'm satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: O'Leary Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mid Eastern writing on box along with English. Seems legit
customer_reviews.author: TinMan

customer_reviews.title: Much better price than local drugstore
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Much better price than local drugstore.
customer_reviews.author: Marie S Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Not to be sold in U.S.A
customer_reviews.text: The fact that labels where covered and container says not to sell in U.S.A. They seem to be accurate. Just don't like the fact they covered things up. They are in code and far enough out good until June 2021
customer_reviews.author: Dale Cali

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Marked Prime but did not receive it with in 2 days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need to deliver the product.  This is not acceptable
customer_reviews.text: Product was not delivered for me to use. This has been 3 days since it was to be delivered. I use this product and it is great, but can’t use it if it isn’t delivered l am very up set
customer_reviews.author: John Ricedroffas

customer_reviews.title: Great For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Vary good price and they works great.I well buy again.
customer_reviews.author: George Bowser

customer_reviews.title: Not for sale in US
customer_reviews.text: This product is not labeled for sale in the US!
customer_reviews.author: alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Why pay for prime
customer_reviews.text: Can't do the survey. I have to receive the item. Not happy with spending my money on prime
customer_reviews.author: Michael Goggin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money , and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bun

customer_reviews.title: Good product - great price
customer_reviews.text: These strips are as described and haven't had a malfunctioning one yet. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: susan c.

customer_reviews.title: cost same as deductable
customer_reviews.text: need to check blood sugar more often then perscription allows so it is wonderful to be able to supplement what insurance covers.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: No pleased with quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this product before and was pleased. This lot was bad having to throw away 25% of the strips do to error reading.
customer_reviews.author: paul herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery time, good quality
customer_reviews.text: It came quite quickly and took our worries away, since we used all our old ones. Good quality for a good price
customer_reviews.author: Boris Budagyan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product from a genuine seller.
customer_reviews.text: Very prompt delivery and very nice and quality product. Plus there was a note from seller that made it all the more nice. Will definitely buy more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These strips are not accurate at all- error message on meter E3
customer_reviews.text: When received this product had another label wrapped around it...the strips keep giving me error messages, E3. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Doug Hughes

customer_reviews.title: These were just what I expected at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: These were just what I expected and were a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, shipping carrier not the best.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and they are exactly what I needed! The downfall was that whoever is the shipping carrier sucks. I normally don't give bad reviews but the box was opened and somewhat crushed. Not okay AT ALL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Chirhart

customer_reviews.title: Requires a very small sample....
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was convenient and easy to use. From start to finish I can get my results in about a minute...
customer_reviews.author: David Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Getting all my Diabetic supplies
customer_reviews.text: It's a great buy for people that don't have insurance
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great price. I saved a great deal of monies. Was delivered before time quoted
customer_reviews.author: SS

product_meta.title: Freestyle lite glucose test strips 50 count
feature_bullets: Patented ZipWik tabs that make application quick and easy
Up to 60 seconds to re-apply blood means FEWER wasted test strips
No coding means one less step

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
